title: Sweaty
description: ゲーム用の分散型ゲームストリーミングサービスやWager(Crypto)アプリ/ウェブサイトはありません。

f6_assessments.q0: The idea itself is good but the plan, rollout and execution is not defined in detail.
f6_assessments.q1: The whole '60 years all together in gaming' is a poor metric in my opinion. Does that mean there is like 10 people with average 6 years of gaming experience? if so, would be better to say that. Also, just because you play games does by no means make people qualified to make a gaming/gambling platform. I would like some real software programming credentials listed. Also details on the team itself would be beneficial.
f6_assessments.q2:
More detail. What coding languages? How big is the team? What experience do they have? How will the money be spent? When will the money be spent? What are some milestones.. 
Having a repository of past projects in an open source repository so people can see the skills you have would give this project some light.
It seems to me that the funding amount was chosen out of nowhere.

f6_assessments.q0:
Draft proposal.

The problem described is not clear. What is the exact problem with not having a decentralized streaming platform? What aspect of centralized streaming platforms could be improved with decentralization?

There is not enough information to assess impact. I would recommend checking the Catalyst documentation for reference to create a new proposal and search for an appropriate challenge to submit the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1:
Draft proposal.

There is not enough information to assess feasibility. I would recommend checking the Catalyst documentation for reference to create a new proposal and search for an appropriate challenge to submit the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2:
Draft proposal.

There is not enough information to assess auditability. I would recommend checking the Catalyst documentation for reference to create a new proposal and search for an appropriate challenge to submit the proposal.

solution: Sweatyは、厳選されたビデオゲームでストリーマーとストリーマーを戦わせ、人々が暗号で賭けることができるようにします。
experience: 私たちのチームは、ゲーム業界で60年、ストリーミング業界で6年の経験があります。カルダノとゲームは私たちの情熱であり、私たちはその両方を一緒にします。
